question: 品物
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>product</kanji> <kanji>thing</kanji> is any type of general <vocabulary>goods</vocabulary>. It's about as specific as you can get when you're talking about <vocabulary>thing</vocabulary>s like this.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the kun'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own, but don't be fooled into using the on'yomis! This isn't <ja>ひんぶつ</ja> — no, it's <ja>しなもの</ja>!
